description: Display a marching rainbow effect on LED matrix displays like Adafruit Matrix Portal S3

variables.name: width
variables.description: Width of the LED matrix in pixels

variables.name: height
variables.description: Height of the LED matrix in pixels

variables.name: bit_depth
variables.description: Bit depth for color (3-6, higher = more colors but more memory)

variables.name: rgb_pins
variables.description: RGB data pins as a list

default_commandline: width height bit_depth rgb_pins addr_pins clock_pin latch_pin output_enable_pin delay
